com.chap.links.client

Class TreeGrid

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.chap.links.client.TreeGrid

  • public class TreeGrid
extends
    The treegrid is a visualization chart to display data in grid view The treegrid is developed in javascript as a Google Visualization Chart. This TreeGrid class is a GWT wrapper for the javascript code.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  TreeGrid.Options
      Options for drawing the treegrid.
